titleStmt.title: His Maiesties declaration to all his subiects of the kingdome of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Castle-Elizabeth in Our Isle of Jersey the twenty third day of October, 1649. In the First Yeare of Our Reigne.
Vowing revenge for his father and asserting his right to the crown.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
